body.description: Up for sale are 100 shark super stainless razor blades for professional straight edge barber razors. Package with 100 individually wrapped blades per box, we sell this product to barbershops for use in their straight edge barber razors that require half a blade. This is the genuine shark super stainless blade that is universally reknown for being long lasting, exceptionally smooth and very sharp. If you use a straight edge razor that accepts half a double edge blade, this professional product is for you. There is no finer blade manufactured for straight edge razors/shavers. We have found that these blades deliver a particularly smooth shave in comparison to other blades that we have evaluated. We are proud to offer this product to compliment our other fine shaving supplies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Real sharp and awesome
reviews.reviewText: A Close Shave: Reviewing Shark Razor BladesGreat fit.Introduction:Finding the right razor blades is essential for a smooth and comfortable shaving experience. In this review, we'll delve into the world of Shark razor blades, exploring their features, performance, and why they may or may not be the ideal choice for your shaving needs.Features:1. **Material**: The material of razor blades is crucial for their performance. High-quality stainless steel blades are known for their sharpness and durability. It's essential to assess the materials used in Shark razor blades to determine their longevity.2. **Sharpness**: A sharp blade is essential for a clean and close shave. Shark razor blades are often praised for their sharp edges, which can provide a precise shaving experience.3. **Compatibility**: Consider whether the Shark razor blades are compatible with your razor handle. Compatibility ensures you can easily replace old blades with new ones without issues.Performance:1. **Smooth Shave**: One of the primary criteria for evaluating razor blades is how smoothly they glide across the skin. A good razor blade should minimize irritation and provide a comfortable shaving experience.2. **Precision**: Precision is key when it comes to shaving, especially in tricky areas like the chin and neck. Assess how well Shark razor blades handle these areas without causing nicks or cuts.3. **Longevity**: The longevity of razor blades varies between brands and models. Some blades may need to be replaced more frequently than others. Determine how long Shark razor blades maintain their sharpness and effectiveness.Pros:- Sharp Blades: Shark razor blades are often known for their sharpness, resulting in a close and clean shave.- Affordability: Many users find Shark razor blades to be competitively priced compared to other brands.- Compatibility: Shark blades are compatible with various razor handles, making it easier to find replacements.Cons:- Durability: Some users have reported that Shark razor blades might not last as long as premium brands.- Skin Sensitivity: As with any razor blade, individuals with sensitive skin may experience irritation or redness.Conclusion:Shark razor blades have earned a reputation for their sharpness and affordability. They offer a close shave for many users and are compatible with various razor handles. However, their durability may vary from person to person, so it's essential to consider your unique shaving needs and skin sensitivity when choosing razor blades. Overall, Shark razor blades can be an excellent choice for those seeking a cost-effective option for a clean and precise shave.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Shark Is Smoooooooth
reviews.reviewText: I've been shaving with double edge safety razors for over a year now and have experimented with a LOT of blades. The Shark Super Stainless line is one of the better values in the shaving world. They're sharp, smooth and last several shaves. I recently bought a Leaf Twig and now a Leaf Thorn, both of which use single edge blades that are simply DE blades snapped in half. That way you don't have to use proprietary blades that often are expensive and/or are hard to find. I snapped a couple of Shark blades in half to use in my Twig but remembered that Shark offers them already cut in half, so I ordered these. Same great quality. Plenty sharp, a fantastic bargain. If you only use each blade once, it's still only a nickel per shave. I highly recommend these for shavers who use the Leaf line of razors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These blades are great and give a nice clean shave with much less irritation than disposable razors. I was gifted a barber razor and a pack of these blades and the pack literally lasted me years, I have a beard so I don't shave Daily but even Daily use these would last a long time at a fraction of the cost of your typical disposable razors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value and they last.
reviews.reviewText: Picked these up and got 4 shaves just out of 1 blade. Good stuff. It will be a long time before I finish the box, but I will buy these again when the time comes. Matches well with clasp type shavettes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp, Inexpensive, Small and Completely Functional!
reviews.reviewText: Cost: Even if you buy a $200 razor handle to go with these you will still be spending less than on the big name razors. Not only are they inexpensive but they do a fantastic job. I've had the same box of razors for over a year and a half and it still has plenty of blades to go.Sharpness: My standard routine is twice a week shaving (unless there is some sort of big to-do on Tuesday) and I make a point to change the blade weekly. Even with 3 days of growth the blades stay sharp enough to avoid nicks, though admittedly trying to push it more than that is a bad idea. If for some reason I switch to a daily routine I still get a solid week of shaves from each blade before having to discard. Because they are razors I've also used them to cut all sorts of tags, shirts strings, and other random stuff (after shaving with them) and had no issues at all.Quality: The miniature box and individual wrapping is all that is needed to keep a blade safe. They mostly sit in a medicine cabinet with stints on the counter or in a travel bag. I've yet to open a single blade that looks anything but brand new - no rust, dulling, or issues even though the box has gotten light water splashed on it a few times.Other: Set aside the price for a minute and consider how much room 100 of the Quattro or Mach 3 blades would take up! This box of 100 occupies that space of about 4 of them. You'll have room and money for all sorts of other accessories.
Le uso tutti i giorni, con una lama riesco a fare tre rasature, buon prodotto
Le coupant est parfait et se garde vraiment dans le temps, ne rouille pas. Rapport qualité pris excellent !
Använder denna för huvudrakning med Leaf razor. Kanon med denna kombo, för mig.Men kom-ihåg att rakblad beror på din hud och hår oavsett var på kroppen… testa dig fram

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fijne mesjes, mooi glad resultaat zonder je snel te verwonden. In vergelijking tot de mesjes die ik bij m’n open scheermes kreeg, zijn deze meer vergevingsgezind. Goede prijs/kwaliteit verhouding.
